{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arris |model=NVG448 |revision=B |asin=B073F17BSG |fcc_date=06/17/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U62L051 |manuf_rev=T00 REV.1 GP |availability=now |type=CPE, dsl modem, wireless router |fcc_id=GZ5NVG4XX,GZ5NVG4XXQ |us_id=6EDDL01BNVG4XX |pcb_id=U62L051T00 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63148;BCM63148ZKFSBG; |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=NAND |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ4G63CFR-RDC |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43217 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43602 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz Front-End Module (FEM);Skyworks;SKY85712-21;;3; |flags=VDSL2, ADSL2+ |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=0C:EA:C9 |oui_eth=0C:EA:C9 }} {{TagLine|802.11ac Wireless DSL Residential Gateway}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.arris.com/products/nvg44x-xdsl-voice-gateway/}} (Arris)
*NVG44X XDSL VOICE GATEWAY, FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/GZ5NVG4XX GZ5NVG4XX] :VDSL2, ADSL2+ Gateways with 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Voice optional
Models available: *NVG443B: VDSL2/ADSL2+ Gateway 2.4/5GHz 802.11abgn/ac *NVG448B: VDSL2/ADSL2+ Gateway 2.4/5GHz 802.11abgn/ac and VoIP *NVG448BQ - DSL/FTTH Gateway for Vantage, FCC ID: GZ5NVG4XXQ *NVG468MQ - FTTH Gateway for FiOS/MoCA, FCC ID: GZ5NVG4XXQ
===Specifications=== Concurrent Wi-Fi: 802.11abgn/ac :Antenna: 5x int. omni-directional antennas with diversity *2.4GHz support: 2x2 (or 3x3 for BQ/MQ - [[Broadcom]]) *5GHz support: 3x3 (or 4x4 for BQ/MQ - [[Quantenna]]) Interfaces: *WAN - Single line or bonded VDSL2, ADSL2+, RJ-14 :One-port 10/100/1000 Ethernet (RJ-45) *LAN – Four-port 10/100/1000 Ethernet switch, RJ-45 :Single-port, dual line voice FXS, RJ-14. *USB 3.0 port, network interface (optional)
The manual states the default IP is 192.168.1.254.
*[https://www.dslreports.com/forum/r31139536-New-Gateways-FiOS-Vantage-Arris-NVG448BQ-NVG468MQ-NVG448B-NVG443B ''Pace NVG443B/NVG448B/NVG448BQ/NVG468MQ'' on '''DSLReports''']
===See also=== :[[Arris]] • [[Pace]] *[[Arris NVG443B]] - VDSL2 CPE [[Broadcom]] BCM63148, FCC ID: GZ5NVG4XX *[[Arris NVG448B]] - VDSL2 CPE [[Broadcom]] BCM63148, FCC ID: GZ5NVG4XX *[[Arris NVG448BQ]] - DSL/FTTH Gateway for Vantage, FCC ID: GZ5NVG4XXQ *[[Arris NVG468MQ]] - FTTH Gateway for FiOS/MoCA, FCC ID: GZ5NVG4XXQ *[[Arris NVG599]] *[[Arris NVG595]] *[[Pace 5168NV]]-110 (Arris Global Limited) - [[Broadcom]] BCM63168 *[[Pace 5268AC]] (Arris Global Limited) [[Broadcom]] - BCM63168 ([https://www.iol.unh.edu/testing/broadband/gvector/equipment testing])
